General.Name: Fujian Sunner Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Fujian Sunner Development Co., Ltd. engages in breeding, slaughtering, processing, and selling of chicken products in China. It also offers frozen chicken products; and deep processed meat products, including chicken, cattle, sheep, pigs, and other products. The company was founded in 1983 and is headquartered in Nanping, China.
General.Address: Shengnong Headquarters Office Building, Nanping, China, 354100

3.Name: Mr. Junjie  Liao
3.Title: Deputy GM & Sec. of the Board of Directors
